oh man i all most got a heart attack when u said the sign up was opened which wasn't "invitation code needed" , anyways if u guys are saying the site's not any good den which site is out there which is about "dvd r" movies and doesn't need an invitation code . very hard to find a private tracker which doesn't need an invitation code for sign up .

you should check out ilovetorrents.com...it seems to be a fairly decent site (at least when compared to tpb)...if you compare it to other private sites then it really isnt that good...its not a bad site so worth the look...you do have to maintain a certain share ratio >.7 i believe at all times

tht site really anit worth it TPB rules seriously , if there is a site about "keeping a ratio or get banned" that is not a problem let me know, i am seeder i seed what i get to a 1.2 ratio at best . Invitation sites have one problem "invitation codes".

ctang

@agentbay 

i totally agree mate .

thats the only reason we basically have all left is the ratio thing...that and you cant upload on tpb using a seedbox bc the seedbox doesnt allow it...it takes me around 4 days to upload 1 DVD9 on tpb when it takes me half that time to upload the same to a seedbox and have unlimited bandwidth with it...i can from the seedbox upload around 40GB a day!!! when you think of that, what is the draw to tpb...to be honest with you, there isnt a draw...at least not for me...i used to get satisfaction form people downloading my torrents from here but now i get tons more from the private people because they SEED BACK or get banned...i dont care that they are forced to seed back, they still are seeding...take this for example, i am downloading Tron (80's movie) currently at 4.5mbps to the seedbox and it was uploaded April 10, 2009...you wont find that on tpb

at least with me, MM and tater on the private sites, it has really allowed SK to blossom!!! props to him :)

so u guys are actually "moving" from TPB to private sites , is Bithq only the private site u guys are uploading to or there are other sites . But does it matter i can't get an invitation code for any invitation site , i am telling u dude its really hard to get one , if u have any suggestions on how to get one please let me know . Thanks

btw u can't use a seedbox in TPB, thats strange i though SK is using a seedbox that is why his torrents are freaking fast . nevertheless u should also put in mind one thing that this is a public tracker so unregistered user won't have right to leave a comment either to thank u for ur work [ i know lazy ppl] . But in private trackers u need to be registered to get a torrent and so . i think u get my point .
